description.value:
Trigger A creature misses you with a melee Strike.

You turn the tables on your attacker, using underhanded tactics to temporarily hinder it, such as throwing dirt in its eyes, shining a light in its face, pulling its coat over its head, or otherwise being a meddlesome nuisance. The triggering creature becomes your choice of @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of its next turn.
